00086 /**
00087  * @brief This static function should be overridden by child classes
00088  * to return an object of the correct type initialized correctly
00089  * with the parameters in the string, string map. All objects
00090  * created this way should be deleted when finished using.
00091  *
00092  * @param param - Map of key/value pairs to initialize the object.
00093  *
00094  * @return Pointer toCreate object, this should be sub casted as necessary.
00095  */
00096 SelfCreate* CNAnalysisMethodAllelicDifferenceCytoScan::newObject(std::map<std::string,std::string>& params)
00097 {
00098     SelfDoc doc = explainSelf();
00099     std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts = getDefaultDocOptions();
00100     CNAnalysisMethodAllelicDifferenceCytoScan* pMethod = new CNAnalysisMethodAllelicDifferenceCytoScan();
00101     std::string strPrefix = getPrefix();
00102 
00103     pMethod->m_dAllelicDifferenceOutlierTrim = setupDoubleParameter("outlier-trim", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00104     pMethod->m_iStep = setupIntParameter("step", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00105     pMethod->m_iWindow = setupIntParameter("window", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00106     pMethod->m_iPointCount = setupIntParameter("point-count", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00107     pMethod->m_dBandwidth = setupDoubleParameter("bandwidth", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00108     pMethod->m_dCutoff = setupDoubleParameter("cutoff", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00109     pMethod->m_dCleanThreshold = setupDoubleParameter("clean-threshold", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00110     pMethod->m_bSymmetry = setupBoolParameter("symmetry", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00111 
00112     return pMethod;
00113 }

00115 /**
00116  * @brief Run the analysis.
00117  */
00118 void CNAnalysisMethodAllelicDifferenceCytoScan::run()
00119 {
00120     Verbose::out(1, "CNAnalysisMethodAllelicDifferenceCytoScan::run(...) start");
00121     isSetup();
00122 //    Verbose::progressBegin(1, "CNAnalysisMethodAllelicDifference::run(...) ", 1, 1, 1);
00123 //    Verbose::progressStep(1);
00124     calculateAllelicDifferences();
00125     removeAllelicDifferencesModulation();
00126     postprocessAllelicDifferences();
00127 //    Verbose::progressEnd(1, "Done");
00128     Verbose::out(1, "CNAnalysisMethodAllelicDifferenceCytoScan::run(...) end");
00129 }

00131 void CNAnalysisMethodAllelicDifferenceCytoScan::removeAllelicDifferencesModulation()
00132 {
00133     getEngine()->setOpt("AD-modulation-no-single-peak", "false");
00134 
00135     if (CovariateParams::m_vAPCovariates.empty()) {
00136         return;
00137     }
00138 
00139     Verbose::out(1, "Running allelic differences modulation correction...");
00140 
00141     // for intermediate data
00142     const bool keepIntermediateData = m_pEngine->getOptBool("keep-intermediate-data");
00143     const double xiLimit = 2.5;
00144 
00145     bool AD_modulation_no_single_peak_state = false;
00146 
00147     determineLocalProbeSets();
00148     fillChrBoundsImpl(getProbeSets(), m_chrBounds);
00149 
00150     std::vector<double> weights;
00151     computeWeights(getProbeSets(), weights);
00152 
00153     int numCovariates = CovariateParams::m_vAPCovariates.size();
00154     for (int iCovariateIndex = 0; iCovariateIndex < numCovariates; iCovariateIndex++)
00155     {
00156         m_vCoarseAllelePeaks.clear();
00157 
00158         std::vector<double> allelicDiffs;
00159 
00160         // find master peaks
00161         std::vector<double> master_xi;
00162         std::vector<double> master_density;
00163         std::vector<int> master_valleyIndex;
00164         std::vector<int> master_peakIndex;
00165     
00166         for (int i = 0; i < getProbeSets()->size(); i++)
00167         {
00168             CNProbeSet *pset = (*getProbeSets())[i];
00169             allelicDiffs.push_back(pset->getAllelicDifference());
00170         }
00171         findDensityAndPeaks( allelicDiffs,
00172                              weights,
00173                              master_xi,
00174                              master_density,
00175                              master_valleyIndex,
00176                              master_peakIndex,
00177                              CovariateParams::m_masterPeakPointCount,
00178                              CovariateParams::m_masterPeakBandwidth
00179                              );
00180 
00181         // remove junk peaks and valleys at the extremities
00182         trimToRange(master_valleyIndex, master_xi, xiLimit);
00183         trimToRange(master_peakIndex, master_xi, xiLimit);
00184 
00185         std::vector<double> intermediate;
00186         if (keepIntermediateData)
00187         {
00188             intermediate = allelicDiffs;      // save for later
00189             intermDensitiesFileInit(iCovariateIndex);
00190             intermDensitiesOutput( master_xi,
00191                                    master_density,
00192                                    master_peakIndex,
00193                                    "RawMasterDensity",
00194                                    "RawMasterPeaks"
00195                                    );
00196         }
00197 
00198         // nothing else to do if only one peak (data presumed too noisy)
00199         if (master_peakIndex.size() <= 1)
00200         {
00201             if (keepIntermediateData) {
00202                 outputIntermediateDataAD(intermediate, iCovariateIndex);
00203                 intermDensitiesFileClose();
00204             }
00205             break;
00206         }
00207 
00208         // coarse "allele peaks" processing if requested for this covariate
00209         if (CovariateParams::m_vCoarseAPAdjust[iCovariateIndex] == "on")
00210         {
00211             allelicDiffs.clear();
00212             weights.clear();
00213             master_xi.clear();
00214             master_density.clear();
00215             master_valleyIndex.clear();
00216             master_peakIndex.clear();
00217 
00218             CNProbeSetArray coarseProbeSets;
00219             coarseAPProcess(iCovariateIndex);
00220 
00221             for (int i = 0; i < getProbeSets()->size(); i++)
00222             {
00223                 double tmp = m_vCoarseAllelePeaks[i];
00224                 if (!isNaN(tmp))
00225                 {
00226                     coarseProbeSets.push_back((*getProbeSets())[i]);
00227                     allelicDiffs.push_back(tmp);
00228                 }
00229             }
00230             std::vector<double> coarseWeights;
00231             computeWeights(&coarseProbeSets, coarseWeights);
00232             findDensityAndPeaks( allelicDiffs,
00233                                  coarseWeights,
00234                                  master_xi,
00235                                  master_density,
00236                                  master_valleyIndex,
00237                                  master_peakIndex,
00238                                  CovariateParams::m_masterPeakPointCount,
00239                                  CovariateParams::m_masterPeakBandwidth
00240                                  );
00241 
00242             // remove junk peaks and valleys at the extremities
00243             trimToRange(master_valleyIndex, master_xi, xiLimit);
00244             trimToRange(master_peakIndex, master_xi, xiLimit);
00245 
00246             if (keepIntermediateData)
00247             {
00248                 intermDensitiesOutput( master_xi,
00249                                        master_density,
00250                                        master_peakIndex,
00251                                        "MasterDensity",
00252                                        "MasterPeaks"
00253                                        );
00254             }
00255         }
00256  
00257         // gather the covariates for binning...
00258         std::vector<float> covariates;
00259         std::vector<std::pair<int, int> > binInfo;
00260         int iTransIndex = CovariateParams::m_vAPCovariates[iCovariateIndex];
00261         for (int iIndex = 0; iIndex < getProbeSets()->size(); iIndex++)
00262         {
00263             CNProbeSet *pset = (*getProbeSets())[iIndex];
00264             float covValue = pset->getCovariateValue(iTransIndex);
00265             if (!isNaN(covValue)) {
00266                 covariates.push_back(covValue);
00267                 binInfo.push_back(std::make_pair(0, iIndex));
00268             }
00269         }
00270 
00271         // all covariates are NaN, don't bother
00272         if (covariates.empty())
00273         {
00274             if (keepIntermediateData) {
00275                 intermDensitiesFileClose();
00276             }
00277             continue;
00278         }
00279 
00280         // ...and bin them
00281         std::vector<int> binning(covariates.size());
00282         int numBins = determineBins(covariates, binning, iCovariateIndex);
00283 
00284         // fill in the binning info
00285         for (int i = 0; i < binInfo.size(); i++) {
00286             binInfo[i].first = binning[i];
00287         }
00288 
00289         // figure out bin membership all at once
00290         std::sort(binInfo.begin(), binInfo.end(), binCompare());
00291 
00292         std::vector<int> binBoundaries(numBins + 1);
00293         binBoundaries[0] = 0;
00294         for (int i = 1; i < numBins; i++)
00295         {
00296             std::pair<int, int> seek = std::make_pair(i, 0);
00297             std::vector<std::pair<int, int> >::iterator bdry =
00298                         std::lower_bound(binInfo.begin(), binInfo.end(), seek, binCompare());
00299 
00300             binBoundaries[i] = bdry - binInfo.begin();
00301         }
00302         binBoundaries[numBins] = binInfo.size();   // sentinel
00303 
00304         for (int iBinIndex = 0; iBinIndex < numBins; iBinIndex++)
00305         {
00306             std::vector<int> probeSetsInBinIdx;
00307             for (
00308                 int iIndex = binBoundaries[iBinIndex];
00309                 iIndex < binBoundaries[iBinIndex + 1];
00310                 iIndex++
00311             ){
00312                 probeSetsInBinIdx.push_back( binInfo[iIndex].second );
00313             }
00314 
00315             // in the coarse peaks case this is a subset of probeSetsInBinIdx[]
00316             // corresponding to the probe sets after the no man's land filtering.
00317             // Otherwise, it's the same as probeSetsInBinIdx[].
00318             CNProbeSetArray probeSetsInBin;
00319             allelicDiffs.clear();
00320             if (CovariateParams::m_vCoarseAPAdjust[iCovariateIndex] == "on")
00321             {
00322                 for (int i = 0; i < probeSetsInBinIdx.size(); i++) {
00323                     double tmp = m_vCoarseAllelePeaks[probeSetsInBinIdx[i]];
00324                     // use only filtered values (no man's land in allele peaks)
00325                     if (!isNaN(tmp)) {
00326                         allelicDiffs.push_back(tmp); 
00327                         probeSetsInBin.push_back((*getProbeSets())[probeSetsInBinIdx[i]]);
00328                     }
00329                 }
00330             } else {
00331                 for (int i = 0; i < probeSetsInBinIdx.size(); i++) {
00332                     allelicDiffs.push_back( (*getProbeSets())[probeSetsInBinIdx[i]]->getAllelicDifference() );
00333                     probeSetsInBin.push_back((*getProbeSets())[probeSetsInBinIdx[i]]);
00334                 }
00335             }
00336 
00337             // bin too small, cannot calculate the bandwidth, don't bother
00338             if (probeSetsInBin.size() <= 1)
00339             {
00340                 continue;
00341             }
00342 
00343             std::vector<double> covBin_weights;
00344             computeWeights(&probeSetsInBin, covBin_weights);
00345 
00346             // find covariate bin peaks
00347             std::vector<double> covBin_xi;
00348             std::vector<double> covBin_density;
00349             std::vector<int> covBin_valleyIndex;
00350             std::vector<int> covBin_peakIndex;
00351 
00352             findDensityAndPeaks( allelicDiffs,
00353                                  covBin_weights,
00354                                  covBin_xi,
00355                                  covBin_density,
00356                                  covBin_valleyIndex,
00357                                  covBin_peakIndex,
00358                                  CovariateParams::m_covariatePeakPointCount,
00359                                  CovariateParams::m_covariatePeakBandwidth
00360                                  );
00361 
00362             // remove junk peaks and valleys at the extremities
00363             trimToRange(covBin_valleyIndex, covBin_xi, xiLimit);
00364             trimToRange(covBin_peakIndex, covBin_xi, xiLimit);
00365 
00366             // the map is: key=cov. bin peak index, value=master peak index
00367             std::map<int, int> matchedPeaks;
00368 
00369             matchPeaks( master_xi,
00370                         master_density,
00371                         master_peakIndex,
00372                         covBin_xi,
00373                         covBin_peakIndex,
00374                         matchedPeaks
00375                         );
00376 
00377             if (keepIntermediateData) {
00378                 std::string binIndexStr = Convert::toString(iBinIndex);
00379                 intermDensitiesOutput( covBin_xi,
00380                                        covBin_density,
00381                                        covBin_peakIndex,
00382                                        "Bin_" + binIndexStr + "_Density",
00383                                        "Bin_" + binIndexStr + "_Peaks"
00384                                        );
00385 
00386                 intermMatchedPeaks( matchedPeaks,
00387                                     covBin_xi,
00388                                     master_xi,
00389                                     "Bin_" + binIndexStr + "_MatchedPeaks"
00390                                     );
00391             }
00392 
00393             // do not adjust this bin if cov. bin data is too noisy (one peak or less)
00394             if (matchedPeaks.size() <= 1)
00395             {
00396                 continue;
00397             }
00398 
00399             adjustByMatchedPeaks( getProbeSets(), probeSetsInBinIdx, master_xi, covBin_xi, matchedPeaks );
00400 
00401             // mark the fact that ADs were altered
00402             AD_modulation_no_single_peak_state = true;
00403         }
00404 
00405         if (keepIntermediateData) {
00406             outputIntermediateDataAD(intermediate, iCovariateIndex);
00407             intermDensitiesFileClose();
00408         }
00409     }
00410 
00411     // flag the relevant cychp header parameter telling it whether the correction was applied
00412     getEngine()->setOpt("AD-modulation-no-single-peak", AD_modulation_no_single_peak_state ? "true" : "false");
00413 
00414     m_vCoarseAllelePeaks.clear();                       // set size=0
00415     std::vector<double>().swap(m_vCoarseAllelePeaks);   // set capacity=0
00416 
00417     Verbose::out(1, "Done");
00418 }
00419 
00420 void CNAnalysisMethodAllelicDifferenceCytoScan::trimToRange(
00421                                                     std::vector<int>& indices,
00422                                                     const std::vector<double>& xi,
00423                                                     const double xiLimit
00424                                                     )
00425 {
00426     std::vector<int> indices_tmp(indices);
00427     indices.clear();
00428 
00429     // ignore indices whose xi values lie outside [-xiLimit, +xiLimit]
00430     for (int i = 0; i < indices_tmp.size(); i++) {
00431         if (std::fabs(xi[indices_tmp[i]]) <= xiLimit) {
00432             indices.push_back(indices_tmp[i]);
00433         }
00434     }
00435 }
00436 
00437 void CNAnalysisMethodAllelicDifferenceCytoScan::findDensityAndPeaks(
00438                                                     const std::vector<double>& allelicDiffs,
00439                                                     const std::vector<double>& weights,
00440                                                     std::vector<double>& xi,
00441                                                     std::vector<double>& density,
00442                                                     std::vector<int>& valleyIndex,
00443                                                     std::vector<int>& peakIndex,
00444                                                     int numPoints,
00445                                                     double bandwidth
00446                                                     )
00447 {
00448     const bool symmetrise = true;
00449 
00450     double bw;
00451     if (symmetrise)
00452     {
00453         int N = allelicDiffs.size();
00454         std::vector<double> symAllelicDiffs(allelicDiffs);
00455         symAllelicDiffs.resize(2*N);
00456         for (int i = N; i < 2*N; i++)
00457         {
00458             symAllelicDiffs[i] = -allelicDiffs[i - N];
00459         }
00460         bw = bwnrd(symAllelicDiffs, bandwidth);
00461     }
00462     else {
00463         bw = bwnrd(allelicDiffs, bandwidth);
00464     }
00465     fitDensityCurve(allelicDiffs, weights, xi, density, numPoints, bw, symmetrise);
00466 
00467     std::vector<double> sqDensity(density.size());
00468     for (int i = 0; i < density.size(); i++) {
00469         sqDensity[i] = density[i] * density[i];
00470     }
00471     double overallSignal = trapzoid(xi, sqDensity);
00472 
00473     findpeaks(valleyIndex, peakIndex, density, 0.046*overallSignal, xi);
00474 }
00475 
00476 void CNAnalysisMethodAllelicDifferenceCytoScan::computeWeights(
00477                                                     CNProbeSetArray *psets,
00478                                                     std::vector<double>& weights
00479                                                     )
00480 {
00481     int N = psets->size();
00482     weights.assign(N, 1.0/N);
00483 }
00484 
00485 void CNAnalysisMethodAllelicDifferenceCytoScan::adjustByMatchedPeaks(
00486                                                         CNProbeSetArray *psets,
00487                                                         const std::vector<int>& probeSetsInBinIdx,
00488                                                         const std::vector<double>& master_xi,
00489                                                         const std::vector<double>& covBin_xi,
00490                                                         const std::map<int, int>& matchedPeaks
00491                                                         )
00492 {
00493     if (matchedPeaks.empty())
00494     {
00495         return;
00496     }
00497 
00498     for (int ii = 0; ii < probeSetsInBinIdx.size(); ii++)
00499     {
00500         int iIndex = probeSetsInBinIdx[ii];
00501         float oldAD = (*psets)[iIndex]->getAllelicDifference();
00502 
00503         // note we rely on std::map keeping keys sorted at all times
00504         std::map<int, int>::const_iterator it, prev_it;
00505         for (it = matchedPeaks.begin(); it != matchedPeaks.end(); ++it) {
00506             double cov_xi = covBin_xi[(*it).first];
00507             if (oldAD - cov_xi < 0) {
00508                 break;
00509             }
00510             prev_it = it;
00511         }
00512 
00513         float newAD;
00514         if (it == matchedPeaks.begin())
00515         {
00516             // interpolation left of the leftmost peak
00517             newAD = oldAD * ( master_xi[(*it).second] / covBin_xi[(*it).first] );
00518         }
00519         else if (it != matchedPeaks.end())
00520         {
00521             // linear interpolation between peaks
00522             double tt = (oldAD - covBin_xi[(*prev_it).first]) / (covBin_xi[(*it).first] - covBin_xi[(*prev_it).first]);
00523             newAD = master_xi[(*prev_it).second] + tt * (master_xi[(*it).second] - master_xi[(*prev_it).second]);
00524         }
00525         else
00526         {
00527             // interpolation right of the rightmost peak
00528             newAD = oldAD * ( master_xi[(*prev_it).second] / covBin_xi[(*prev_it).first] );
00529         }
00530 
00531         (*psets)[iIndex]->setAllelicDifference(newAD);
00532     }
00533 }
00534 
00535 void CNAnalysisMethodAllelicDifferenceCytoScan::matchPeaks(
00536                                                     const std::vector<double>& master_xi,
00537                                                     const std::vector<double>& master_density,
00538                                                     const std::vector<int>& master_peakIndex,
00539                                                     const std::vector<double>& covBin_xi,
00540                                                     const std::vector<int>& covBin_peakIndex,
00541                                                     std::map<int, int>& matchedPeaks
00542                                                     )
00543 {
00544     const float peakTrim = 2.5;
00545     const float significantlyCloserRatio = 0.5;
00546 
00547     // Throw away peaks outside the [-peakTrim, +peakTrim] range and
00548     // insert master peak index together with corresponding density into a pair.
00549     // This is done to enable sorting master peaks by density (aka. ranking master peaks)
00550     // which is needed for matching.
00551     std::vector<std::pair<int, double> > trimmed_master_peakIndex;
00552     for (int i = 0; i < master_peakIndex.size(); i++) {
00553         int j = master_peakIndex[i];
00554         if (master_xi[j] >= -peakTrim && master_xi[j] <= peakTrim) {
00555             trimmed_master_peakIndex.push_back( std::make_pair(j, master_density[j]) );
00556         }
00557     }
00558 
00559     // sort trimmed_master_peakIndex in the density height (rank) order
00560     std::sort( trimmed_master_peakIndex.begin(),
00561                trimmed_master_peakIndex.end(),
00562                comparePeakRank
00563                );
00564 
00565     // for covariate bin peaks collect just the peak indices inside [-peakTrim, +peakTrim]
00566     std::vector<int> trimmed_covBin_peakIndex;
00567     for (int i = 0; i < covBin_peakIndex.size(); i++) {
00568         int j = covBin_peakIndex[i];
00569         if (covBin_xi[j] >= -peakTrim && covBin_xi[j] <= peakTrim) {
00570             trimmed_covBin_peakIndex.push_back(j);
00571         }
00572     }
00573 
00574     if (trimmed_covBin_peakIndex.empty())
00575     {
00576         return;
00577     }
00578 
00579     // peak matching
00580     for (int iIndex = 0; iIndex < trimmed_master_peakIndex.size(); iIndex++) {
00581         // find cov. bin peak closest to this master peak
00582         int closestIndex = 0;
00583         double closestDist = std::fabs( covBin_xi[trimmed_covBin_peakIndex[0]] - master_xi[trimmed_master_peakIndex[iIndex].first] );
00584         for (int jIndex = 1; jIndex < trimmed_covBin_peakIndex.size(); jIndex++)
00585         {
00586             double curDist = std::fabs( covBin_xi[trimmed_covBin_peakIndex[jIndex]] - master_xi[trimmed_master_peakIndex[iIndex].first] );
00587             if (closestDist > curDist)
00588             {
00589                 closestDist = curDist;
00590                 closestIndex = jIndex;
00591             }
00592         }
00593 
00594         // see if it was already matched to a master peak
00595         std::map<int, int>::iterator it = matchedPeaks.find( trimmed_covBin_peakIndex[closestIndex] );
00596         bool matched = it != matchedPeaks.end();
00597         if (matched) {
00598             // now see if it is "significantly closer" to current master peak than
00599             // to the master peak it's been associated with, and reassign if it is indeed "significantly closer"
00600             double distAssociated = std::fabs( covBin_xi[trimmed_covBin_peakIndex[closestIndex]] - master_xi[(*it).second] );
00601             double distCurrent  = std::fabs( covBin_xi[trimmed_covBin_peakIndex[closestIndex]] - master_xi[trimmed_master_peakIndex[iIndex].first] );
00602             if (distCurrent < significantlyCloserRatio * distAssociated)
00603             {
00604                 matchedPeaks[trimmed_covBin_peakIndex[closestIndex]] = trimmed_master_peakIndex[iIndex].first;
00605             }
00606         } else {
00607             // match it to current master peak
00608             matchedPeaks[trimmed_covBin_peakIndex[closestIndex]] = trimmed_master_peakIndex[iIndex].first;
00609         }
00610     }
00611 }
00612 
00613 bool CNAnalysisMethodAllelicDifferenceCytoScan::comparePeakRank(const std::pair<int, double>& a, const std::pair<int, double>& b)
00614 {
00615     return a.second > b.second;
00616 }
00617 
00618 void CNAnalysisMethodAllelicDifferenceCytoScan::outputIntermediateDataAD(const std::vector<double>& intermediate,
00619                                                                          int iCovariateIndex
00620                                                                          )
00621 {
00622     affx::File5_File file5;
00623     affx::File5_Group* group5;
00624     affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = NULL;
00625 
00626     std::string analysisString = "analysis";
00627     std::string covarString = ".covar" + Convert::toString(iCovariateIndex);
00628     std::string strExperimentName = getExperiment()->getExperimentName();
00629     std::string fileName = Fs::join(getEngine()->getOpt("out-dir"), analysisString,
00630                                     strExperimentName + covarString + ".adjustedAD.a5");
00631 
00632     Verbose::out(3, "Writing intermediate data for " + fileName);
00633 
00634     try {
00635         file5.open(fileName, affx::FILE5_CREATE | affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00636         group5 = file5.openGroup("AllelicDifferences", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00637 
00638         tsv5 = group5->openTsv("AllelicDifferences", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00639         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 0, "ProbeSetName", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_STRING, 20);
00640         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 1, "Chromosome", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00641         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 2, "Position", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00642         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 3, "OldAllelicDifference", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
00643         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 4, "NewAllelicDifference", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
00644 
00645         for (int i = 0; i < getProbeSets()->size(); i++)
00646         {
00647             tsv5->set_string(0, 0, (*getProbeSets())[i]->getProbeSetName());
00648             tsv5->set_i(0, 1, (*getProbeSets())[i]->getChromosome());
00649             tsv5->set_i(0, 2, (*getProbeSets())[i]->getPosition());
00650             tsv5->set_d(0, 3, intermediate[i]);
00651             tsv5->set_d(0, 4, (*getProbeSets())[i]->getAllelicDifference());
00652             tsv5->writeLevel(0);
00653         }
00654         tsv5->close();
00655         delete tsv5;
00656 
00657         delete group5;
00658         file5.close();
00659     }
00660     catch(...){ throw(Except("Cannot open file " + fileName + " while attempting to dump allelic difference data to file."));}
00661 }

00683 void CNAnalysisMethodAllelicDifferenceCytoScan::intermDensitiesOutput(
00684                                                     const std::vector<double>& xi,
00685                                                     const std::vector<double>& density,
00686                                                     const std::vector<int>& peakIndex,
00687                                                     const std::string& densityName,
00688                                                     const std::string& peaksName
00689                                                     )
00690 {
00691     affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = NULL;
00692 
00693     tsv5 = m_group5->openTsv(densityName.c_str(), affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00694     tsv5->defineColumn(0, 0, "xi", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
00695     tsv5->defineColumn(0, 1, "DensityValue", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
00696 
00697     for (int i = 0; i < xi.size(); i++)
00698     {
00699         tsv5->set_d(0, 0, xi[i]);
00700         tsv5->set_d(0, 1, density[i]);
00701         tsv5->writeLevel(0);
00702     }
00703     tsv5->close();
00704     delete tsv5;
00705 
00706     tsv5 = m_group5->openTsv(peaksName.c_str(), affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00707     tsv5->defineColumn(0, 0, "PeakIndex", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00708     tsv5->defineColumn(0, 1, "PeakLocation", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
00709 
00710     for (int i = 0; i < peakIndex.size(); i++)
00711     {
00712         tsv5->set_i(0, 0, peakIndex[i]);
00713         tsv5->set_d(0, 1, xi[ peakIndex[i] ]);
00714         tsv5->writeLevel(0);
00715     }
00716     tsv5->close();
00717     delete tsv5;
00718 }

00720 
00721 void CNAnalysisMethodAllelicDifferenceCytoScan::intermMatchedPeaks(
00722                                                     const std::map<int, int>& matchedPeaks,
00723                                                     const std::vector<double>& covBin_xi,
00724                                                     const std::vector<double>& master_xi,
00725                                                     const std::string& matchedName
00726                                                     )
00727 {
00728     affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = NULL;
00729 
00730     tsv5 = m_group5->openTsv(matchedName.c_str(), affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00731     tsv5->defineColumn(0, 0, "MasterPeakIndex", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00732     tsv5->defineColumn(0, 1, "BinPeakIndex", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00733     tsv5->defineColumn(0, 2, "MasterPeakLocation", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
00734     tsv5->defineColumn(0, 3, "BinPeakLocation", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
00735 
00736     std::map<int, int>::const_iterator it;
00737     for (it = matchedPeaks.begin(); it != matchedPeaks.end(); ++it)
00738     {
00739         tsv5->set_i(0, 0, (*it).second);
00740         tsv5->set_i(0, 1, (*it).first);
00741         tsv5->set_d(0, 2, master_xi[ (*it).second ]);
00742         tsv5->set_d(0, 3, covBin_xi[ (*it).first ]);
00743         tsv5->writeLevel(0);
00744     }
00745     tsv5->close();
00746     delete tsv5;
00747 }

00753     m_file5.close();

00755 
00756 void CNAnalysisMethodAllelicDifferenceCytoScan::coarseAPProcess(int iCovariateIndex)
00757 {
00758     // same parameters as for standard allelic differences postprocessing for now
00759     const float dThreePeakFLD_X = 0.0;
00760     const float dThreePeakFLD_Y = 0.0;
00761 
00762     const float dFourPeakFLD_X = 0.0;
00763     const float dFourPeakFLD_Y = 0.0;
00764 
00765     float threePeakShrink_x[] = { 0.0, 15.0, 20.0 };
00766     float threePeakShrink_y[] = { 0.4, 0.3, 0.2 };
00767 
00768     float fourPeakShrink_x[] = { 0.0, 15.0, 20.0, 25.0 };
00769     float fourPeakShrink_y[] = { 0.6, 0.5, 0.45, 0.4 };
00770 
00771     m_vThreePeakFLD_X.push_back(dThreePeakFLD_X);
00772     m_vThreePeakFLD_Y.push_back(dThreePeakFLD_Y);
00773 
00774     m_vFourPeakFLD_X.push_back(dFourPeakFLD_X);
00775     m_vFourPeakFLD_Y.push_back(dFourPeakFLD_Y);
00776 
00777     for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
00778         m_vThreePeakShrink_X.push_back(threePeakShrink_x[i]);
00779         m_vThreePeakShrink_Y.push_back(threePeakShrink_y[i]);
00780     }
00781     for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
00782         m_vFourPeakShrink_X.push_back(fourPeakShrink_x[i]);
00783         m_vFourPeakShrink_Y.push_back(fourPeakShrink_y[i]);
00784     }
00785  
00786     CNAnalysisMethod::PeakShrinkOverride paramOverride;
00787 
00788     paramOverride.m_iStep_override           = CovariateParams::m_vCoarseAPAdjustStep          [iCovariateIndex];
00789     paramOverride.m_iWindow_override         = CovariateParams::m_vCoarseAPAdjustWindow        [iCovariateIndex];
00790     paramOverride.m_iPointCount_override     = CovariateParams::m_vCoarseAPAdjustPointCount    [iCovariateIndex];
00791     paramOverride.m_dBandwidth_override      = CovariateParams::m_vCoarseAPAdjustBandwidth     [iCovariateIndex];
00792     paramOverride.m_dCutoff_override         = CovariateParams::m_vCoarseAPAdjustCutoff        [iCovariateIndex];
00793     paramOverride.m_dCleanThreshold_override = CovariateParams::m_vCoarseAPAdjustCleanthreshold[iCovariateIndex];
00794     paramOverride.m_iCovariateIndex          = iCovariateIndex;
00795     paramOverride.m_bSymmetry_override       = true;
00796 
00797     shrinkToPeaks(getProbeSets(), &paramOverride);
00798 }
00799 
00800 void CNAnalysisMethodAllelicDifferenceCytoScan::postprocessAllelicDifferences()
00801 {
00802     resetAllelePeakInitialValues();
00803     determineLocalProbeSets();
00804     fillChrBoundsImpl(getProbeSets(), m_chrBounds);
00805     calculateSNPQC(getProbeSets());
00806 
00807     const float dThreePeakFLD_X = 0.0;
00808     const float dThreePeakFLD_Y = 0.0;
00809 
00810     const float dFourPeakFLD_X = 0.0;
00811     const float dFourPeakFLD_Y = 0.0;
00812 
00813     float threePeakShrink_x[] = { 0.0, 15.0, 20.0 };
00814     float threePeakShrink_y[] = { 0.4, 0.3, 0.2 };
00815 
00816     float fourPeakShrink_x[] = { 0.0, 15.0, 20.0, 25.0 };
00817     float fourPeakShrink_y[] = { 0.6, 0.5, 0.45, 0.4 };
00818 
00819     m_vThreePeakFLD_X.push_back(dThreePeakFLD_X);
00820     m_vThreePeakFLD_Y.push_back(dThreePeakFLD_Y);
00821 
00822     m_vFourPeakFLD_X.push_back(dFourPeakFLD_X);
00823     m_vFourPeakFLD_Y.push_back(dFourPeakFLD_Y);
00824 
00825     for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
00826         m_vThreePeakShrink_X.push_back(threePeakShrink_x[i]);
00827         m_vThreePeakShrink_Y.push_back(threePeakShrink_y[i]);
00828     }
00829     for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
00830         m_vFourPeakShrink_X.push_back(fourPeakShrink_x[i]);
00831         m_vFourPeakShrink_Y.push_back(fourPeakShrink_y[i]);
00832     }
00833 
00834     shrinkToPeaks(getProbeSets());
00835 }
00836 
00837 void CNAnalysisMethodAllelicDifferenceCytoScan::calculateSNPQC(CNProbeSetArray* vProbeSets)
00838 {
00839     const double log2 = log(2.0);
00840 
00841         // Make a copy of pointers to probe sets sorted by name
00842         CNProbeSetArray resortedProbeSets = *vProbeSets;
00843         resortedProbeSets.quickSort(0);
00844 
00845     AffxArray<AffxString> arSNPIds;
00846     if ((m_pEngine->isOptDefined("snp-qc-snp-list")) && (m_pEngine->getOpt("snp-qc-snp-list") != ""))
00847     {
00848       affx::TsvFile tsv;
00849       tsv.m_optAutoTrim = true;
00850       tsv.openTable(m_pEngine->getOpt("snp-qc-snp-list"));
00851       std::string strSnp;
00852       while (tsv.nextLevel(0) == affx::TSV_OK) {
00853         tsv.get(0,0,strSnp);
00854         arSNPIds.add(new AffxString(strSnp));
00855       }
00856       tsv.close();
00857 
00858     }
00859     arSNPIds.quickSort(0);
00860 
00861     std::vector<double> vData;
00862 
00863         AffxString strReferenceFileName = m_pEngine->getOpt("reference-file");
00864         affx::File5_File file5;
00865         affx::File5_Group* group5 = NULL;
00866         affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = NULL;
00867 
00868         file5.open(strReferenceFileName, affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00869         group5 = file5.openGroup("CN5", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00870         tsv5 = group5->openTsv("CN5.snp-posteriors", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00871 
00872         while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK) {
00873             string probeSetName;
00874             double clusterAAmean;
00875             double clusterABmean;
00876             double clusterBBmean;
00877 
00878             tsv5->get(0, 0, &probeSetName);
00879             tsv5->get(0, 2, &clusterAAmean);
00880             tsv5->get(0, 6, &clusterABmean);
00881             tsv5->get(0, 10, &clusterBBmean);
00882 
00883             if (!arSNPIds.empty()) {
00884                 AffxString str(probeSetName);
00885                 if (arSNPIds.binarySearch(str, 0) == -1) {
00886                     continue;
00887                 }
00888             }
00889             CNProbeSet searchProbeSet;
00890             searchProbeSet.setProbeSetName(probeSetName);
00891             pair<CNProbeSetArray::iterator, CNProbeSetArray::iterator> range = equal_range(
00892                                                                                     resortedProbeSets.begin(),
00893                                                                                     resortedProbeSets.end(),
00894                                                                                     &searchProbeSet,
00895                                                                                     NameCompare()
00896                                                                                     );
00897             if (range.first == range.second) {
00898                 continue;
00899             }
00900 
00901             CNProbeSet* foundProbeSet = *range.first;
00902             if (foundProbeSet->processAsVisualization())
00903             {
00904                 double log2ratio = log(foundProbeSet->getAAlleleSignal()/foundProbeSet->getBAlleleSignal())/log2;
00905                 double scaledLog2Ratio = log2ratio - clusterABmean;
00906                 scaledLog2Ratio /= 0.5*(abs(clusterAAmean - clusterABmean) + abs(clusterBBmean - clusterABmean));
00907                 vData.push_back(scaledLog2Ratio);
00908             }
00909         }
00910         tsv5->close();
00911         delete tsv5;
00912 
00913         group5->close();
00914         delete group5;
00915         file5.close();
00916 
00917     arSNPIds.deleteAll();
00918 
00919     for (int i = 0; (i < vData.size()); i++)
00920     {
00921         if (vData[i] != vData[i])
00922         {
00923             vData[i] = 0;
00924         }
00925     }
00926 
00927     m_pobjExperiment->setSNPQC(HomHiLoCelListener::computeSNPQC(vData));
00928     // If this is run now, it shouldn't be rerun in CNAnalysisEngine::postProcessing()
00929     m_pobjExperiment->setIsSNPQCset(true);
00930 }
00931 
00932 void CNAnalysisMethodAllelicDifferenceCytoScan::ADOutlierTrim(double& ad)
00933 {
00934     if (ad > m_dAllelicDifferenceOutlierTrim) {
00935         ad = m_dAllelicDifferenceOutlierTrim;
00936     }
00937     else if (ad < -m_dAllelicDifferenceOutlierTrim) {
00938         ad = -m_dAllelicDifferenceOutlierTrim;
00939     }
00940 }
00941 
00942 int CNAnalysisMethodAllelicDifferenceCytoScan::determineBins(vector<float>& covValues, vector<int>& binning, int covariateIndex)
00943 {
00944     if (CovariateParams::useEquallyPopulatedAPBins(covariateIndex))
00945     {   
00946         int numBins = CovariateParams::getNumAPBins(covariateIndex);
00947         CNAnalysisMethod::binEqualNumber(covValues, binning, numBins);
00948         return numBins;
00949     }       
00950     else if (CovariateParams::useEquallySpacedAPBins(covariateIndex))
00951     {       
00952         int numBins = CovariateParams::getNumAPBins(covariateIndex);
00953         CNAnalysisMethod::binEqualSpacing(covValues, binning, numBins);
00954         return numBins;
00955     }           
00956     else if (CovariateParams::isAPCovariateDiscrete(covariateIndex))
00957     {       
00958         return CNAnalysisMethod::covariateIsBinAssignment(covValues, binning);
00959     }           
00960     else // unknown binning
00961     {       
00962         // This is a late error.
00963         Err::errAbort("Unknown allelic difference covariate binning type");
00964     }
00965     return 0;
00966 }
